PAD_FromHideout.synopsis: Character comments about seeing crates and stuff upon arriving to Zhent secret Port from the Zhent Hideout via elevator.Mayor beats are: "Zhentarim were storing shit down here" and "we are so far down. Is this the Underdark?"

PAD_Recognize.synopsis: Player enters Zhentarim port in the Underdark and recognizes the symbol (or at least vaguely remembers).

PAD_FromHideout_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FromHideout_0.text: Long ride down. Is this... the Underdark?

PAD_FromHideout_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FromHideout_2.text: A dangerous place to stock goods, even for a Zhent.

PAD_FromHideout_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FromHideout_1.text: The Underdark - a foolish place to hide contraband, even for a Zhent.
PAD_FromHideout_1.context: NodeContext: Matter-of-fact. This is just an observation they make.

PAD_Recognize_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Recognize_0.text: The Zhentarim - mercenaries and cut-throats. Useful friends, if you can afford them.
